long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔐 ChatBlurr - Privacy Guard for WhatsApp™ Web

Keep your WhatsApp conversations confidential in public! 👀

🌟 Key Features:

Instant Message Privacy: Messages stay blurred until you hover over them
Smart Blur Control: Customize which elements to protect
One-Click Toggle: Quick enable/disable with keyboard shortcut (Alt+X)
Zero Data Collection: Your privacy is our priority 🛡️
✨ What You Can Protect:

Chat Messages & Media
Message Previews
Profile Pictures
Photos & Videos
Stickers & GIFs
🚀 Perfect for:

Office environments
Public transportation
Coffee shops
Co-working spaces
Screen sharing
Public presentations
⚡️ Simple to use:

Install extension
Open WhatsApp Web
Enjoy instant privacy protection!
🔄 Fully Customizable Settings:

Choose blur intensity
Select specific elements to protect
Customize keyboard shortcuts
Toggle privacy features instantly
🛡️ Privacy-First Design:

No data collection
Works offline
Open-source security
Regular security updates
💼 Professional Solution:

Protect sensitive business communications
Maintain confidentiality in public spaces
Perfect for remote work environments
#WhatsAppPrivacy #MessageSecurity #PrivacyTool #DataProtection #WhatsAppWeb #PrivacyExtension #SecurityTools #OnlinePrivacy

⚠️ Note: WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc. ChatBlurr is an independent privacy enhancement tool.
